name: Is ant alone?
description:
You are the leader of the black ants.

Your anthill was destroyed recently and many of your soldier ants have got caught by the spiders. Rescue them and head back to the anthill, where your queen is waiting.

WASD - to move

Spacebar - to free a soldier ant trapped in a cocoon

A bright white light will appear from the exit once the ants are saved, and that is your destination.
